Title: Atomic Blade
Description: A blade with its edge sharpened to a single atom, allowing it to slice through molecules.

Title: Plasma Rifle
Description: A simple plasma rifle. Well-used but cared for and in good condition.

Title: Space-Time Claws
Description: Strange claws constructed from collapsed space-time through unknown means.

Title: Ghostly Whispers
Description: Ghostly whispers of a long dead race.

Title: Black Hole Bomb
Description: A dangerous weapon that creates a black hole when thrown.

Title: Coronal Mass Ejection
Description: An effect-bound item reserved for the living star enemy type

Title: Laser Rifle
Description: A high-powered, quick-release laser emitter in a shoulder-braced casing, able to focus its energy on a distant spot

Title: Armour Repair Kit
Description: Holds additional armour plating complete with automatically recircuiting electronics. Also effectively staunches active bleeding.

Title: Robotic Arm
Description: A severed cybernetic prosthesis. Can be used as a weapon if you're creative enough.
